frontmatter.title: Web Performance and Optimization
frontmatter.author: Omar
frontmatter.excerpt: In March 2020, I spoke about web performance and optimization in a survey talk at IEEE@UC alongside Noah Bass, Kristian Snyder, and Isiah Lloyd...

markdownRemark.html:
In March 2020, I spoke about web performance and optimization in a survey talk at IEEE@UC alongside Noah Bass, Kristian Snyder, and Isiah Lloyd. See the video below.

We covered a survey of web topics, from image optimization and source code minification to content delivery networks:

  1. Why does web performance matter? (00:57)
  2. Introduction to the Google Chrome DevTools (03:43)
  3. Tree shaking optimization (09:15)
  4. Network optimizations (16:20)
  5. Finally, caching files with service workers (24:37)
